name: Cooking Camps
description: Weeklong and single-day cooking camps run during school holidays and summer break for kids ages 4-10. Through hands-on, sensory adventures, they teach an intuitive approach to cooking that empowers young chefs to trust their instincts while exploring global flavors and techniques.
fullDescription: Weeklong and single-day cooking camps run during school holidays and summer break for kids ages 4-10. Through hands-on, sensory adventures, they teach an intuitive approach to cooking that empowers young chefs to trust their instincts while exploring global flavors and techniques.
